channel.title: SMF 79 Subtype 2 on IBM SMF Explorer
channel.description: Recent content in SMF 79 Subtype 2 on IBM SMF Explorer

item.title: Field - altvm
item.description: Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Running under an alternate virtual machine environment Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field fla.

item.title: Field - asl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79ASL Description LENGTH OF DATA SECTION

item.title: Field - asn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79ASN Description NUMBER OF DATA SECTION

item.title: Field - ass
item.description: OFFSET TO DATA SECTION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79ASS Description OFFSET TO DATA SECTION

item.title: Field - bfy
item.description: SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Record: SMF79S2 Based on: flg Description SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field flg.

item.title: Field - boost_class
item.description: Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Boost class is set at end of interval, valid only when zIIP boost and/or Speed boost is active: 001 IPL, 010 Shutdown, 011 Recovery Process Post-Processed Flags postprocessor for multiple bit mapping.

item.title: Field - cne
item.description: Equipped with ESCON channel Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description Equipped with ESCON channel Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field prf.

item.title: Field - cnv
item.description: Data converted from version 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Data converted from version 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field fla.

item.title: Field - cyc
item.description: Sampling cycle length Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79CYC Description Sampling cycle length

item.title: Field - dat
item.description: Date monitor interval start Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79DAT Description Date monitor interval start

item.title: Field - date
item.description: Date of Record Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79DTE

item.title: Field - dcl
item.description: LENGTH OF DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79DCL Description LENGTH OF DATA CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - dcn
item.description: NUMBER OF DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79DCN Description NUMBER OF DATA CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - dcs
item.description: OFFSET TO DATA CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79DCS Description OFFSET TO DATA CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - drc
item.description: ESCON Director in configuration Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description ESCON Director in configuration Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field prf.

item.title: Field - dte
item.description: DATE RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79DTE Description DATE RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - eed
item.description: Speed boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Speed boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 10 of field fla.

item.title: Field - eme
item.description: System in z/ARCH mode Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description System in z/ARCH mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field prf.

item.title: Field - esa
item.description: MVS/ESA IF ON Record: SMF79S2 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field flg.

item.title: Field - fla
item.description: Flags Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79FLA Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description cnv 0 Data converted from version 2 iss 1 Invalid samples to be skipped m3r 2 Record was written by RMF Monitor III ism 3 Interval was under SMF control rcl 4 SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR.

item.title: Field - flg
item.description: SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79FLG Description SYSTEM INDICATOR FLAGS Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description rrf 0 NEW RECORD FORMAT sut 1 SUBTYPES USED v4 3 MVS/ESA V4 IF ON esa 4 MVS/ESA IF ON vxa 5 MVS/XA IF ON os 6 OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 bfy 7 SYSTEM RUNNING IN PR/SM MODE

item.title: Field - gie
item.description: Projected gathering interval end GMT time Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79GIE Description Projected gathering interval end GMT time

item.title: Field - iet
item.description: Interval expiration time token Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IET Description Interval expiration time token

item.title: Field - iip
item.description: zIIP boost was active during entire interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description zIIP boost was active during entire interval Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 9 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iml
item.description: Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IML Description Indicates the type of processor complex on which data measurements were taken. X'03’ = 9672, zSeries

item.title: Field - int
item.description: Duration of monitor interval Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79INT Description Duration of monitor interval

item.title: Field - ism
item.description: Interval was under SMF control Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Interval was under SMF control Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field fla.

item.title: Field - iss
item.description: Invalid samples to be skipped Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Invalid samples to be skipped Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field fla.

item.title: Field - ist
item.description: Time monitor interval start Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79IST Description Time monitor interval start

item.title: Field - len
item.description: SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79LEN Description SMF RECORD LENGTH. ZERO AFTER GRBSMFR REASSEMBLY

item.title: Field - lgo
item.description: Offset GMT to local time Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79LGO Description Offset GMT to local time

item.title: Field - m3r
item.description: Record was written by RMF Monitor III Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description Record was written by RMF Monitor III Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field fla.

item.title: Field - mcl
item.description: LENGTH OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79MCL Description LENGTH OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - mcn
item.description: NUMBER OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79MCN Description NUMBER OF MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - mcs
item.description: OFFSET TO MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79MCS Description OFFSET TO MONITOR II CONTROL SECTION

item.title: Field - mfv
item.description: RMF version number Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79MFV Description RMF version number

item.title: Field - mvs
item.description: MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79MVS Description MVS software level (consists of an acronym and the version, release, and modification level - ZVvvrrmm)

item.title: Field - oil
item.description: Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds) Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79OIL Description Original interval length as defined in the session or by SMF (in seconds)

item.title: Field - os
item.description: OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Record: SMF79S2 Based on: flg Description OPERATING SYSTEM IS OS/VS2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field flg.

item.title: Field - pe2
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 2 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 2 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field prf.

item.title: Field - ped
item.description: Enhanced DAT facility 1 Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description Enhanced DAT facility 1 Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prd
item.description: Product name Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PRD Description Product name

item.title: Field - prf
item.description: Processor flags Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PRF Description Processor flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description qes 0 System has expanded storage cne 1 Equipped with ESCON channel drc 2 ESCON Director in configuration eme 3 System in z/ARCH mode pri 4 At least one zAAP is currently installed prp 5 At least one zIIP is currently installed ped 6 Enhanced DAT facility 1 pe2 7 Enhanced DAT facility 2

item.title: Field - pri
item.description: At least one zAAP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zAAP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prl
item.description: LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79PRL Description LENGTH OF RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - prn
item.description: NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79PRN Description NUMBER OF RMF PRODUCT SECTIONS

item.title: Field - prp
item.description: At least one zIIP is currently installed Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description At least one zIIP is currently installed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field prf.

item.title: Field - prs
item.description: OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79PRS Description OFFSET TO RMF PRODUCT SECTION

item.title: Field - ptn
item.description: PR/SM partition number Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79PTN Description PR/SM partition number

item.title: Field - qes
item.description: System has expanded storage Map: SMF79PRO Based on: prf Description System has expanded storage Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field prf.

item.title: Field - qsl
item.description: LENGTH IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79QSL Description LENGTH IOQ GLOBAL SECTION

item.title: Field - qsn
item.description: NUMBER IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79QSN Description NUMBER IOQ GLOBAL SECTION

item.title: Field - qss
item.description: OFFSET IOQ GLOBAL SECTION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79QSS Description OFFSET IOQ GLOBAL SECTION

item.title: Field - r792ars
item.description: Avg number of real frames for step Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792ARS Description Avg number of real frames for step

item.title: Field - r792asid
item.description: ASID number Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792ASID Description ASID number

item.title: Field - r792asst
item.description: CPU time consumed by preemptible class SRBs running on behalf of this AS in milliseconds. (assbasst) Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792ASST Description CPU time consumed by preemptible class SRBs running on behalf of this AS in milliseconds. (assbasst)

item.title: Field - r792ccimp
item.description: CPU protection was implicitly assigned Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg3 Description CPU protection was implicitly assigned Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r792flg3.

item.title: Field - r792cipg
item.description: Service class was assigned by classification, or RESET SRVCLASS belongs to I/O priority group HIGH in the active policy Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg3 Description Service class was assigned by classification, or RESET SRVCLASS belongs to I/O priority group HIGH in the active policy Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r792flg3.

item.title: Field - r792cl
item.description: Current location IN - In storage, OT - Swapped out and ready, LO - Logically swapped out, NS - Non swappable, WM - Wait queue/MSO, WL - Wait queue/long wait, WT - Wait queue/term wait, WO - Wait queue/others, DL - TSO user delayed by SRM to meet response time objective, PR - Privileged, » - Transitioning out, « - Transitioning in Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792CL Description Current location IN - In storage, OT - Swapped out and ready, LO - Logically swapped out, NS - Non swappable, WM - Wait queue/MSO, WL - Wait queue/long wait, WT - Wait queue/term wait, WO - Wait queue/others, DL - TSO user delayed by SRM to meet response time objective, PR - Privileged, » - Transitioning out, « - Transitioning in

item.title: Field - r792cmni
item.description: Number of common pages for current transaction Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792CMNI Description Number of common pages for current transaction

item.title: Field - r792cprc
item.description: Service class assigned by classification or RESET SRVCLASS was designated CPU-critical in the active policy Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg2 Description Service class assigned by classification or RESET SRVCLASS was designated CPU-critical in the active policy Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r792flg2.

item.title: Field - r792cpre
item.description: Address space matched a classification rule in the active policy which was designated storage-critical Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg2 Description Address space matched a classification rule in the active policy which was designated storage-critical Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r792flg2.

item.title: Field - r792cpri
item.description: Address space is serving transactions which belong to a service class that was designated storage-critical in the active policy’s classification rule, or is running in SYSTEM/SYSSTC Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg2 Description Address space is serving transactions which belong to a service class that was designated storage-critical in the active policy’s classification rule, or is running in SYSTEM/SYSSTC Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r792flg2.

item.title: Field - r792cpup
item.description: CPU protection was assigned either to the address space or to transaction service classes being served by the space or implicitly Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg2 Description CPU protection was assigned either to the address space or to transaction service classes being served by the space or implicitly Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r792flg2.

item.title: Field - r792crmp
item.description: The dispatch priority of the address space is currently promoted due to a chronic resource contention Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg2 Description The dispatch priority of the address space is currently promoted due to a chronic resource contention Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r792flg2.

item.title: Field - r792csai
item.description: Number of CSA pages swapped in for current transaction Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792CSAI Description Number of CSA pages swapped in for current transaction

item.title: Field - r792ejst
item.description: Total CPU time consumed on behalf of this address space in milliseconds (ascbejst+ascbsrbt+assbasst). Wraps after 4 Giga millisec Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792EJST Description Total CPU time consumed on behalf of this address space in milliseconds (ascbejst+ascbsrbt+assbasst). Wraps after 4 Giga millisec

item.title: Field - r792excp
item.description: EXCP count for step Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792EXCP Description EXCP count for step

item.title: Field - r792exct
item.description: New EXCP count Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792EXCT Description New EXCP count

item.title: Field - r792excw
item.description: EXCP Count ( DWord ) Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792EXCW Description EXCP Count ( DWord )

item.title: Field - r792flg
item.description: Flags Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792FLG Description Flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r792xm 0 Cross memory address space r792rsm 1 Invalid RSM data for address space obtained r792goal 3 On = system is in GOAL mode r792srv 4 On = this address space is a server address space Off = GOAL specified for this address space is being honored by wlm r792qsc 5 On = address space has been quiesced by a RESET command r792txme 6 Address space matched a classification rule in the active policy which prevents managing the region based on the response time goals of its served transactions r792taff 7 On = address space has temporal affinities, same as RASDTAF

item.title: Field - r792flg2
item.description: Additional flags Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792FLG2 Description Additional flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r792cprc 0 Service class assigned by classification or RESET SRVCLASS was designated CPU-critical in the active policy r792cpre 1 Address space matched a classification rule in the active policy which was designated storage-critical r792cpri 2 Address space is serving transactions which belong to a service class that was designated storage-critical in the active policy’s classification rule, or is running in SYSTEM/SYSSTC r792cpup 3 CPU protection was assigned either to the address space or to transaction service classes being served by the space or implicitly r792stop 4 Storage protection was assigned either to the address space or to transaction service classes being served by the space r792crmp 5 The dispatch priority of the address space is currently promoted due to a chronic resource contention r792txmb 6 Address space is a CICS TOR that matched a classification rule in the active policy which allows managing the region based on the region goals but also ensures that completed transactions are reported and used for management of the CICS AORs r792nohp 7 Honor priority ineligibility was assigned either to the address space or to transaction service classes being served by the space

item.title: Field - r792flg3
item.description: Additional flags Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792FLG3 Description Additional flags Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r792cipg 0 Service class was assigned by classification, or RESET SRVCLASS belongs to I/O priority group HIGH in the active policy r792iopg 1 I/O priority group HIGH was assigned either to the address space or to transaction service classes served by the address space r792itrg 2 R792RGRP is the name of a tenant resource group r792iisp 3 General purpose and specialty processor consumption is considered by WLM capping algorithms for this address space r792irpb 5 On = data in R792RPBoost is valid.

item.title: Field - r792fxab
item.description: Number of fixed frames between 16M and 2G (ESAME mode only) Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792FXAB Description Number of fixed frames between 16M and 2G (ESAME mode only)

item.title: Field - r792fxbl
item.description: Number of fixed frames which are located below 16M real Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792FXBL Description Number of fixed frames which are located below 16M real

item.title: Field - r792goal
item.description: On = system is in GOAL mode Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg Description On = system is in GOAL mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r792flg.

item.title: Field - r792iisp
item.description: General purpose and specialty processor consumption is considered by WLM capping algorithms for this address space Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg3 Description General purpose and specialty processor consumption is considered by WLM capping algorithms for this address space Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r792flg3.

item.title: Field - r792iopg
item.description: I/O priority group HIGH was assigned either to the address space or to transaction service classes served by the address space Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg3 Description I/O priority group HIGH was assigned either to the address space or to transaction service classes served by the address space Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r792flg3.

item.title: Field - r792irpb
item.description: On = data in R792RPBoost is valid. Off = not valid Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg3 Description On = data in R792RPBoost is valid. Off = not valid Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r792flg3.

item.title: Field - r792itrg
item.description: R792RGRP is the name of a tenant resource group Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg3 Description R792RGRP is the name of a tenant resource group Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r792flg3.

item.title: Field - r792jbn
item.description: Name of job Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792JBN Description Name of job

item.title: Field - r792lpai
item.description: Number of LPA pages swapped in for current transaction Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792LPAI Description Number of LPA pages swapped in for current transaction

item.title: Field - r792lsqa
item.description: Number of LSQA fixed frames Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792LSQA Description Number of LSQA fixed frames

item.title: Field - r792lsqe
item.description: LSQA pages in ext. storage CNTFTLSD - CNTFRLSD Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792LSQE Description LSQA pages in ext. storage CNTFTLSD - CNTFRLSD

item.title: Field - r792lsqr
item.description: LSQA pages in real storage Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792LSQR Description LSQA pages in real storage

item.title: Field - r792nffi
item.description: Normalization factor for zAAP service time. Used to convert between real zAAP times and “normalized” zAAP times, i.e. the equivalent time on a standard CP. Multiply R792TIFA by this value and divide by 256 to calculate the normalized zAAP time Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792NFFI Description Normalization factor for zAAP service time. Used to convert between real zAAP times and “normalized” zAAP times, i.e. the equivalent time on a standard CP.

item.title: Field - r792nffs
item.description: Normalization factor for zIIP service time. Used to convert between real zIIP times and “normalized” zIIP times, i.e. the equivalent time on a standard CP. Multiply R792TSUP by this value and divide by 256 to calculate the normalized zIIP time. Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792NFFS Description Normalization factor for zIIP service time. Used to convert between real zIIP times and “normalized” zIIP times, i.e. the equivalent time on a standard CP.

item.title: Field - r792nlqf
item.description: Number of non-LSQA fixed frames for this job Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792NLQF Description Number of non-LSQA fixed frames for this job

item.title: Field - r792nohp
item.description: Honor priority ineligibility was assigned either to the address space or to transaction service classes being served by the space Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg2 Description Honor priority ineligibility was assigned either to the address space or to transaction service classes being served by the space Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r792flg2.

item.title: Field - r792phsp
item.description: Total hiperspace pages for current transaction Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792PHSP Description Total hiperspace pages for current transaction

item.title: Field - r792phta
item.description: zAAP-only equivalent of R792PHTM (ASSB_IFA_PHTM). This is normalized time Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792PHTA Description zAAP-only equivalent of R792PHTM (ASSB_IFA_PHTM). This is normalized time

item.title: Field - r792phti
item.description: zIIP-only equivalent of R792PHTM (ASSB_zIIP_PHTM). This is normalized time Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792PHTI Description zIIP-only equivalent of R792PHTM (ASSB_zIIP_PHTM). This is normalized time

item.title: Field - r792phtm
item.description: CPU time consumed by preemptible class SRBs running in this AS in millisecs. (assbphtm) Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792PHTM Description CPU time consumed by preemptible class SRBs running in this AS in millisecs. (assbphtm)

item.title: Field - r792pin
item.description: Page-in count Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792PIN Description Page-in count

item.title: Field - r792pnv
item.description: Number of non-VIO pages for current transaction Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792PNV Description Number of non-VIO pages for current transaction

item.title: Field - r792prfx
item.description: Number of private fixed frames Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792PRFX Description Number of private fixed frames

item.title: Field - r792pss
item.description: Step product of frame in milliseconds Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792PSS Description Step product of frame in milliseconds

item.title: Field - r792pss1
item.description: High order word Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792PSS1 Description High order word

item.title: Field - r792pss2
item.description: Low order word Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792PSS2 Description Low order word

item.title: Field - r792pswp
item.description: Number of pages swapped in for current transaction Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792PSWP Description Number of pages swapped in for current transaction

item.title: Field - r792pvio
item.description: Number of VIO pages for current transaction Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792PVIO Description Number of VIO pages for current transaction

item.title: Field - r792qsc
item.description: On = address space has been quiesced by a RESET command Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg Description On = address space has been quiesced by a RESET command Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r792flg.

item.title: Field - r792rgrp
item.description: Resource group name Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792RGRP Description Resource group name

item.title: Field - r792rpboost
item.description: Address space matched a classification rule in the active policy which enables for recovery process boost. Only valid if R792IRPB = On. Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg3 Description Address space matched a classification rule in the active policy which enables for recovery process boost. Only valid if R792IRPB = On. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r792flg3.

item.title: Field - r792rsm
item.description: Invalid RSM data for address space obtained Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg Description Invalid RSM data for address space obtained Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r792flg.

item.title: Field - r792rtm
item.description: Resident time for step, in seconds Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792RTM Description Resident time for step, in seconds

item.title: Field - r792scl
item.description: Service class name Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792SCL Description Service class name

item.title: Field - r792scp
item.description: Service class period Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792SCP Description Service class period

item.title: Field - r792srv
item.description: On = this address space is a server address space Off = GOAL specified for this address space is being honored by wlm Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg Description On = this address space is a server address space Off = GOAL specified for this address space is being honored by wlm Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r792flg.

item.title: Field - r792stop
item.description: Storage protection was assigned either to the address space or to transaction service classes being served by the space Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg2 Description Storage protection was assigned either to the address space or to transaction service classes being served by the space Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r792flg2.

item.title: Field - r792svar
item.description: SRM service absorption rate for step Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792SVAR Description SRM service absorption rate for step

item.title: Field - r792taff
item.description: On = address space has temporal affinities, same as RASDTAF Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg Description On = address space has temporal affinities, same as RASDTAF Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r792flg.

item.title: Field - r792tas
item.description: Type of user 0 - Batch, 1 - Started task, 2 - Mount task, 3 - TSO, 4 - ASCH, 5 - OMVS Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792TAS Description Type of user 0 - Batch, 1 - Started task, 2 - Mount task, 3 - TSO, 4 - ASCH, 5 - OMVS

item.title: Field - r792tcp
item.description: CPU time consumed on standard CPs (ASSB_TIME_ON_CP). Only valid if zAAPs or zIIPs in configuration Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792TCP Description CPU time consumed on standard CPs (ASSB_TIME_ON_CP). Only valid if zAAPs or zIIPs in configuration

item.title: Field - r792tcpc
item.description: Total CPU time consumed in this address space in milliseconds. (ascbejst+ascbsrbt+ascbphtm) Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792TCPC Description Total CPU time consumed in this address space in milliseconds. (ascbejst+ascbsrbt+ascbphtm)

item.title: Field - r792tcpu
item.description: Total TCB time for step in milliseconds. Wraps after 4 Giga millisec Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792TCPU Description Total TCB time for step in milliseconds. Wraps after 4 Giga millisec

item.title: Field - r792tdev
item.description: Total device connect time in milliseconds Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792TDEV Description Total device connect time in milliseconds

item.title: Field - r792tifa
item.description: CPU time consumed on zAAPs (ASSB_TIME_ON_IFA) Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792TIFA Description CPU time consumed on zAAPs (ASSB_TIME_ON_IFA)

item.title: Field - r792tifc
item.description: CPU time consumed on standard CPs by zAAP eligible work (ASSB_TIME_IFA_ON_CP) Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792TIFC Description CPU time consumed on standard CPs by zAAP eligible work (ASSB_TIME_IFA_ON_CP)

item.title: Field - r792trc
item.description: Transaction count Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792TRC Description Transaction count

item.title: Field - r792trtm
item.description: Transaction residency time Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792TRTM Description Transaction residency time

item.title: Field - r792tsrm
item.description: Total SRM service for step Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792TSRM Description Total SRM service for step

item.title: Field - r792tsuc
item.description: CPU time consumed on standard CPs by zIIP eligible work (ASSB_TIME_zIIP_ON_CP) Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792TSUC Description CPU time consumed on standard CPs by zIIP eligible work (ASSB_TIME_zIIP_ON_CP)

item.title: Field - r792tsup
item.description: CPU time consumed on zIIPs (ASSB_TIME_ON_zIIP) Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792TSUP Description CPU time consumed on zIIPs (ASSB_TIME_ON_zIIP)

item.title: Field - r792ttod
item.description: Transaction elapsed time, in milliseconds Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792TTOD Description Transaction elapsed time, in milliseconds

item.title: Field - r792twss
item.description: SRM target working set size for this job Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792TWSS Description SRM target working set size for this job

item.title: Field - r792txmb
item.description: Address space is a CICS TOR that matched a classification rule in the active policy which allows managing the region based on the region goals but also ensures that completed transactions are reported and used for management of the CICS AORs Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg2 Description Address space is a CICS TOR that matched a classification rule in the active policy which allows managing the region based on the region goals but also ensures that completed transactions are reported and used for management of the CICS AORs

item.title: Field - r792txme
item.description: Address space matched a classification rule in the active policy which prevents managing the region based on the response time goals of its served transactions Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg Description Address space matched a classification rule in the active policy which prevents managing the region based on the response time goals of its served transactions Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r792flg.

item.title: Field - r792wkld
item.description: Workload name Map: R792ELEM Based on: R792WKLD Description Workload name

item.title: Field - r792xm
item.description: Cross memory address space Map: R792ELEM Based on: r792flg Description Cross memory address space Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r792flg.

item.title: Field - r79ctext
item.description: Command text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79CTEXT Description Command text

item.title: Field - r79ctxtl
item.description: Length of command text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79CTXTL Description Length of command text

item.title: Field - r79dtext
item.description: Default DR text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79DTEXT Description Default DR text

item.title: Field - r79dtxtl
item.description: Length default DR text Map: R79CHL Based on: R79DTXTL Description Length default DR text

item.title: Field - r79goal
item.description: System is in GOAL mode Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description System is in GOAL mode Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79gtod
item.description: Time when the call to data gatherer was issued Map: R79CHL Based on: R79GTOD Description Time when the call to data gatherer was issued

item.title: Field - r79inv
item.description: inval. data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description inval. data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 6 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79ist
item.description: Monitor I interval start time Map: R79CHL Based on: R79IST Description Monitor I interval start time

item.title: Field - r79iwmtk
item.description: Token returned from IWMRCOLL service Map: R79CHL Based on: R79IWMTK Description Token returned from IWMRCOLL service

item.title: Field - r79lf2
item.description: Flag byte Map: R79CHL Based on: R79LF2 Description Flag byte Flag fields This is a flag field with the following bit fields: Field Bit-Position Description r79par 0 Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering r79sg 1 Report sorted by SG r79rsm 2 Invalid RSM data obtained r79goal 3 System is in GOAL mode r79trxi 4 Invalid transaction data r79srmc 5 SRM mode changed r79inv 6 inval. data fr. Mon I (DEV PGSP IOQ) r79maxd 7 Incomplete device data due to too many devices

item.title: Field - r79maxd
item.description: Incomplete device data due to too many devices Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Incomplete device data due to too many devices Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 7 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79nxt
item.description: Number of data sections in following small records Map: R79CHL Based on: R79NXT Description Number of data sections in following small records

item.title: Field - r79par
item.description: Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Not enough relocate section to complete data gathering Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79rid
item.description: Measurement name Map: R79CHL Based on: R79RID Description Measurement name

item.title: Field - r79rsm
item.description: Invalid RSM data obtained Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Invalid RSM data obtained Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 2 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79ses
item.description: Session name Map: R79CHL Based on: R79SES Description Session name

item.title: Field - r79sg
item.description: Report sorted by SG Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Report sorted by SG Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79srmc
item.description: SRM mode changed Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description SRM mode changed Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79tot
item.description: Total number of data sections in large record Map: R79CHL Based on: R79TOT Description Total number of data sections in large record

item.title: Field - r79trxi
item.description: Invalid transaction data Map: R79CHL Based on: r79lf2 Description Invalid transaction data Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field r79lf2.

item.title: Field - r79tsr
item.description: Total number of small records Map: R79CHL Based on: R79TSR Description Total number of small records

item.title: Field - r79user
item.description: User field Map: R79CHL Based on: R79USER Description User field

item.title: Field - ral
item.description: Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAL Description Length of reassembly area. Area consists of a fixed header and a variable number of information blocks. Length depends on the record type/subtype, but is fixed for a specific type/subtype

item.title: Field - ran
item.description: Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken. If 1, record is broken. Offset and length are only valid if SMFxxRAN is 1. Reassembly area is only present in broken records. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAN Description Number of reassembly area. This field is used to indicate whether SMF record is broken. If 0, record is not broken.

item.title: Field - rao
item.description: Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79RAO Description Offset to reassembly area relative to start of RMF product section

item.title: Field - rch
item.description: SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to higher release or service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rcl
item.description: SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Map: SMF79PRO Based on: fla Description SMF record converted to lower service level. Bit is set by SMF record retrieval service GRBSMFR. Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 4 of field fla.

item.title: Field - rrf
item.description: NEW RECORD FORMAT Record: SMF79S2 Based on: flg Description NEW RECORD FORMAT Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 0 of field flg.

item.title: Field - rty
item.description: RECORD TYPE Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79RTY Description RECORD TYPE

item.title: Field - sam
item.description: Number of samples Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SAM Description Number of samples

item.title: Field - seg
item.description: SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79SEG Description SEGMENT DESCRIPTOR

item.title: Field - sid
item.description: SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79SID Description SYSTEM ID FROM INSTALLATION

item.title: Field - snm
item.description: System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SNM Description System name for current system as defined in CVTSNAME

item.title: Field - srl
item.description: SMF record level Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SRL Description SMF record level

item.title: Field - ssi
item.description: SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF ) Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79SSI Description SUBSYSTEM ID (RMF )

item.title: Field - sty
item.description: SUBTYPE Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79STY Description SUBTYPE

item.title: Field - sut
item.description: SUBTYPES USED Record: SMF79S2 Based on: flg Description SUBTYPES USED Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 1 of field flg.

item.title: Field - syn
item.description: SYNC value in seconds Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79SYN Description SYNC value in seconds

item.title: Field - time
item.description: Time of Record Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79TME

item.title: Field - timestamp
item.description: Record Timestamp Record: SMF79S2 Based on: date, time Description Timestamp from SMF data Post-Processed This field is combined from a date and a time field to form a timestamp.

item.title: Field - tme
item.description: TIME RECORD WRITTEN Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79TME Description TIME RECORD WRITTEN

item.title: Field - trn
item.description: NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC Record: SMF79S2 Based on: SMF79TRN Description NUMBER OF TRIPLETS IN THIS REC

item.title: Field - v4
item.description: MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Record: SMF79S2 Based on: flg Description MVS/ESA V4 IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 3 of field flg.

item.title: Field - vxa
item.description: MVS/XA IF ON Record: SMF79S2 Based on: flg Description MVS/XA IF ON Post-Processed This virtual field corresponds to the flag at bit-position 5 of field flg.

item.title: Field - xnm
item.description: Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX Map: SMF79PRO Based on: SMF79XNM Description Sysplex name as defined in ECVTSPLX
